SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.level

Class LevelViewLevelTwo

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.level.LevelView
com.example.demo.level.LevelViewLevelTwo
Direct Known Subclasses:
LevelViewLevelFour
public class LevelViewLevelTwo extends LevelView
Represents the view for Level Two. This class extends LevelView and manages the specific behavior and elements of Level Two.

      public LevelViewLevelTwo(javafx.scene.Group root, int heartsToDisplay, int bossHealth, int totalEnemiesPerTime)
      Constructs a LevelViewLevelTwo object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      root - the root group for the level view
      heartsToDisplay - the number of hearts to display
      bossHealth - the initial health of the boss
      totalEnemiesPerTime - the total number of enemies per time
